Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • java.applet.Applet
            • cc.Main
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Main
extends java.applet.Applet
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The Main class is the host applet for the game.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Robert
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
